inventory=[{"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 53, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 9, "index": 20}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 46, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_trapdoor", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}]
thought: I need to craft 4 honey_bottles in a 2x2 square to craft a honey_block. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the honey_bottles in slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
